naslov: Prekrasna vila sa bazenom Krk, 213 m2 + okućnica (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se prekrasna samostojeća kuća B1- urbana vila s bazenom smještena na otoku Krku, u mjestu Brzac, stambene površine 213 m2. Vila se sastoji od prizemlja i kata te pripadajuće okućnice. U prizemlju se nalazi ulazni prostor, kuhinja s blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom, spavaća soba s vlastitom kupaonicom, wc, spremište, sauna, dva spremišta te natkrivena terasa. Na katu su smještene tri spavaće sobe s izlazima na terasu, dvije kupaonice, garderoba, natkrivena i nenatkrivena terasa. Vila ima predivan pogled na more i kompletno je završena. Unutrašnjost je u potpunosti namještena i kao takva se prodaje. Okoliš je uređen sa zelenilom i sustavom navodnjavanja te ogradom na daljinski. Oprema: - priprema za Grijanje vode u bazenu toplinskom pumpom - električno podno grijanje cijelog objekta, moguća regulacija preko wi-fi-ja - priprema za fotonaponsku elektranu na krovu - namještaj - osnovni (kuhinja po mjeri sa aparatima, stol i stolice, garnitura za dnevni boravak, kreveti u spavaćim sobama, ormari, kupaonski osnovni namještaj i sanitarije, TV u dnevnom boravku - klima uređaji u svakoj sobi i dnevnom boravku, LG Art cool - sauna - rasvjetna tijela - Semelrock opločnici -"Cifre" keramika - Porotherm opeka - STO fasadni sustav - panoramske podizno klizne stijene, PVC - priprema za punjene električnih vozila Tlocrt vile: natkriveni ulaz:     4,67 m2 ulaz:                        8,56 m2 soba 1:                    9,84 m2 kupaonica 1:          4,01 m2 sauna:                     3,23 m2 kuhinja, blagovaonica i dn. boravak: 38,06 m2 spremište 1:                                            4,87 m2 spremište 2:                                           3,29 m2 wc:                                                            1,54 m2 natkrivena terasa:                                 30,52 m2 0,50 prizemlje ukupno:                                108,59 m2 K A T Stubište:             5,88 m2 hodnik:               6,23 m2 soba 2:               12,05 m2 kupaonica 2:      5,26 m2 soba 3:               12,07 m2 soba 4:               17,39 m2 kupaonica 3:      3,60 m2 garderoba:         2,61 m2 natkrivena terasa: 29,78 m2 nenatkrivena terasa: 9,53  m2 1.kat  ukupno:                         104,40 m2 UKUPNO:                        212,99     m2 Bruto građevinski volumen BGV GRAĐEVINE:           527,44 m3 BGV  BAZENA:                 25,16 m3 BGV  UKUPNO:               552,60 m3 Mjesto Brzac se nalazi na zapadnoj strani otoka i udaljeno je kilometar od plaže. Pruža prekrasan pogled na otok Cres. Stari dio mjesta posjeduje kamene kuće i uske uličice. U blizini je Vela Jana – uvala s plažom i malom marinom. Tri kilometra od sela, na obali nalazi se Glavotok s franjevačkim samostanom iz 15. st. i malenom crkvicom na samom moru. Brzac je 15 km udaljen od grada Krka i 13 km od naselja Malinska. Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon 098 / 915 - 5643 ( Ivan ) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01 / 3866 - 844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 000 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com For   sale   is   a   beautiful   detached   house   B1   -   an   urban   villa   located   on   the   island   of   Krk  ,   in   Brzac  ,   with   a   living   area   of   213   m2  .   The   villa   consists   of   ground   floor   and   first   floor   and   an   associated   garden  .   On   the   ground   floor   there   is   an   entrance   hall  ,   a   kitchen   with   a   dining   room   and   a   living   room  ,   a   bedroom   with   its   own   bathroom  ,   a   toilet  ,   a   storage   room  ,   a   sauna  ,   two   storage   rooms   and   a   covered   terrace  .   Upstairs   there   are   three   bedrooms   with   access   to   the   terrace  ,   two   bathrooms  ,   a   dressing   room  ,   a   covered   and   an   uncovered   terrace  .   The   villa   has   a   beautiful   view   of   the   sea   and   is   completely   finished  .   The   interior   is   fully   furnished   and   as   such   is   for   sale  .   The   environment   is   landscaped   with   greenery   and   an   irrigation   system   and   a   remote   fence  . Equipment:   -   Preparation   for   Heating   the   water   in   the   pool   with   a   heat   pump   -   Electric   underfloor   heating   of   the   entire   building  ,   possible   regulation   via   Wi  -  Fi   -   preparation   for   a   photovoltaic   power   plant   on   the   roof   -   Furniture   -   basic   (  custom-  made   kitchen   with   appliances  ,   table   and   chairs  ,   living   room   furniture  ,   beds   in   the   bedrooms  ,   wardrobes  ,   bathroom   basic   furniture   and   sanitary   ware  ,   TV   in   the   living   room   -   air   conditioners   in   every   room   and   living   room  ,   LG   Art   cool   -sauna   -   Lighting   fixtures   -   Semelrock   Paving   -  "  Figures  "   ceramics   -   Porotherm   brick   -   STO   fa  çade   system   -   Panoramic   lift  -  and  -  slide   walls  ,   PVC   -   preparation   for   charged   electric   vehicles. Floor   plan   of   the   villa  : Covered   entrance  :   4  .  67   m2 Entrance  :   8  .  56   m2 Room   1  :   9  .  84   m2 Bathroom   1  :   4  .  01   m2 S auna  :   3  .  23   m2 K itchen  ,  D ining   room  ,  L iving   space  :   38  .  06   m2 Storage   1  :   4  .  87   m2 Storage   2  :   3  .  29   m2 Toilet  :   1  .  54   m2 Covered   terrace  :   30  .  52   m2 Total   ground   floor  :   108  .  59   m2 K   A   T Staircase  :   5  .  88   m2 Hallway  :   6  .  23   m2 Room   2  :   12  .  05   m2 Bathroom   2  :   5  .  26   m2 Bedroom   3  :   12  .  07   m2 Room   4  :   17  .  39   m2 Bathroom   3  :   3  .  60   m2 Wardrobe  :   2  .  61   m2 Covered   terrace  :   29  .  78   m2 U ncovered   terrace  :   9  .  53   m2 1st   floor   total  :   104  .  40   m2 TOTAL  :   212  .  99   m2 Gross   construction   area BGV   BUILDINGS  :   527  .  44   m3 BGV   SWIMMING   POOL  :   25  ,  16   m3 BGV   TOTAL  :   552  ,  60   m3 The   town   of   Brzac   is   located   on   the   west   side   of the   island   and   is   a   kilometer   away   from   the   beach  .   It   offers   a   beautiful   view   of   the   island   of   Cres  .   The   old   part   of   the   place   has   stone   houses   and   narrow   streets  .   Nearby   is   Vela   Jana   –   a   bay   with   a   beach   and   a   small   marina  .   Three   kilometers   from   the   village  ,   on   the   coast  ,   there   is   Glavotok   with   a   Franciscan   monastery   from   the   15th   century  .   and   a   small   church   right   by   the   sea  .   The   rapids   are   15   km   away   from   the   town   of   Krk   and   13   km   from   the   village   of   Malinska  .
